hotels.title: Tranquil Kent Countryside Escape near London & The White Cliffs of Dover
hotels.description: Perfectly located off the M20, the boutique Ashford International Hotel & Spa is a blissfully tranquil property awash with understated luxury. Tucked away in the heart of the Kent countryside, with London’s bright lights within an hour's drive, this truly relaxing hotel invites you to embrace the nearby leafy green landscapes, café culture and postcard landmarks. When you're not enjoying the hotel's host of amenities, including an ultra-stylish spa, heated pool, a state-of-the-art gym and two elegant dining venues, you'll be well located for exploration. Hit Ashford Designer Outlet's high-end shopping, visit Leeds and Deal Castle, unearth the coastal town of Whitstable and stand atop the White Cliffs of Dover. As an added bonus, with the Channel and Dover Ferry Terminal so close, France is just around the corner.
